summary.body: As a relatively new resident (and also hopeful about the weather!) I wanted to know about the tennis courts within the Barbican - do you need to book and / or pay for these?
summary.subject: Tennis court

summary.body: I have a knackered old sofa that I want to dispose of. Will the estates office take it away? Anyone know the process?
summary.subject: Getting Rid of a sofa

summary.body: are ymca residents allowed access to the estate private gardens?
summary.subject: barbican private areas

summary.body: hi, can anyone tell me how to book/ gain access to the tennis courts? thanks in advance for the help.
summary.subject: tennis courts

summary.body: Has anyone recently experienced the consent procedure for mezzanines? Many thanks,
summary.subject: Alterations/consent
